summary: This is an email chain between US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff discussing scheduling a unit meeting and welcoming a new member. It includes a forwarded case list that identifies 'Epstein' as an active public corruption case (EFTA00103744).

persons.name: Russell
persons.context: Mentioned as the person who requested an active case list be put together.

events.title: Email Chain Regarding Unit Meeting and Case List
events.description: Staff at the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York discuss scheduling a unit meeting, welcoming a new member, and share an active case list.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The correspondence includes planning for a unit meeting and welcoming a new staff member.
A forwarded message contains an 'Active Case List' requested by someone named Russell.
The case list explicitly categorizes an 'Epstein' case (EFTA00103744) under 'Public Corruption'.
The email date is September 10, 2019, indicating the Epstein case was active and classified as public corruption at that time.
